Method Detail

registerReceiver

public BroadcastChannel registerReceiver(Receiver r,
                                         String channelName)
Adds the receiving circuit to listen on a channel and returns the BroadcastChannel object that the receiver was added to. If a BroadcastChannel by that name was not found a new one is created.

Parameters:
r - The receiving circuit.
channelName - Name of the receiver's channel.
Returns:
The channel that the receiver was added to.

registerTransmitter

public BroadcastChannel registerTransmitter(Transmitter t,
                                            String channelName)
Adds the transmitter circuit to a channel and returns the BroadcastChannel object that the transmitter was added to. If a BroadcastChannel by that name was not found a new one is created.

Parameters:
r - The receiving circuit.
channelName - Name of the receiver's channel.
Returns:
The channel that the receiver was added to.

removeTransmitter

public boolean removeTransmitter(Transmitter t)
Removes this transmitter from the list and removes its channel if it's deserted.

Parameters:
t - a transmitting circuit.
Returns:
true if the transmitter was actually removed.

removeReceiver

public boolean removeReceiver(Receiver r)
Removes this receiver from the list and removes its channel if it's deserted.

Parameters:
r - a receiving circuit.
Returns:
true if the receiver was actually removed.

getChannelByName

public BroadcastChannel getChannelByName(String name,
                                         boolean create)
If the named channel doesn't exist and create is true, a new channel is created.

Parameters:
Channel - name
boolean - create
Returns:
a BroadcastChannel instance representing the named channel.
